description: The Verbatim Easy Riser(TM) Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse is ultra slim and fits easily into your backpack or tote. A unique, innovative design enables users to adjust the height of the mouse with the flick of a switch.  The mouse height, which can be changed to the flat position for traveling, can be raised to provide comfort and support during use. With a nano receiver that’s small enough to plug into your laptop and leave, this mouse provides 2.4 GHz wireless performance. Its high-resolution laser technology also gives more precise tracking for smoother cursor movement on a variety of surfaces. With an energy-efficient sleep mode, the Verbatim Easy Riser(TM) mouse saves batteries. The Verbatim Easy Riser(TM) Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse also comes with software that allows you to assign a function to the scroll wheel to make your work easier.
title: Verbatim 96992 Easy Riser Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse with Nano Receiver- Silver and Black
